title: Staggering Numbers On The Broken Border (Ep 1853)
description:
In this episode, I address the Democrat’s destructive plan to interfere in elections, and the confused messaging they’re employing to do it. I also discuss the Martha’s Vineyard meltdown. 

News Picks:

Biden Admin Awards $80 Million Contract That Prohibits GPS Monitoring Of Illegal Immigrants.

Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency exposed for 'Ministry of Truth' dirty work.


To understand why teachers stayed home last year, look at the New York Times union.


Americans Are Getting Raises That Fail To Keep Up With Record Inflation.

Biden’s war on oil and gas continues.


Here’s The NY Times article about mail in ballot issues.
